sem:triple.sem:subject: /en/dukat
sem:triple.sem:object: Gul Dukat is the main antagonist of the television series Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. A member of the fictional Cardassian species, he is introduced as the former overseer of the series' namesake space station but goes on to become the leader of his species' governing body, the Cardassian Union. At times an enemy while at others an ally of the series' protagonist, Benjamin Sisko, Dukat appears in 35 of the series' 176 episodes, beginning with the pilot episode, "Emissary", and ending with the series finale, "What You Leave Behind". He is portrayed by Marc Alaimo throughout.

resource.name: Dukat
resource.description: Gul Dukat is the main antagonist of the television series Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. A member of the fictional Cardassian species, he is introduced as the former overseer of the series' namesake space station but goes on to become the leader of his species' governing body, the Cardassian Union. At times an enemy while at others an ally of the series' protagonist, Benjamin Sisko, Dukat appears in 35 of the series' 176 episodes, beginning with the pilot episode, "Emissary", and ending with the series finale, "What You Leave Behind". He is portrayed by Marc Alaimo throughout.
